scripts.db:reset: docker compose down -v && docker compose up -d && pnpm db:migrate
scripts.db:migrate: cd packages/db && npx prisma migrate deploy
scripts.db:migrate:dev: cd packages/db && npx prisma migrate dev
scripts.db:migrate:status: cd packages/db && npx prisma migrate status
scripts.db:push: cd packages/db && npx prisma db push
scripts.db:seed: cd packages/db && npx prisma db seed
